description: Alain Herz examines his ethnicity, tracing it back to his parents Jewish/Polish background, his upbringing in Belgium and his eventual migration from France to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000983; Stories from the Jewish Community; Active; 2007
